for_anyone.name: Tristar Website
for_anyone.description: A website for Tri-Star Dental Clinic. The website is built on Squarespace. I implemented a custom Squarespace template.

for_anyone.name: Homeless Portland
for_anyone.description: A website to raise awareness on Portland's homelessness issue.

for_anyone.name: TRI Web Directory
for_anyone.description: A custom web directory page within a Squarespace website. I implemented it using a custom post type, in order to make it easy for the client to add more people to the directory.

for_anyone.name: CCFD6 Website
for_anyone.description: A donation website for Clark County Fire District 6. In my team, I was in charge of implementing a custom WordPress theme to fit the client’s need. (Please note that this URL is not the official URL of the fire district as they are still working on content before making it live)

for_anyone.name: Timesheet
for_anyone.description: A simple timesheet logger. Built with JavaScript

for_anyone.name: Beats Logo Animation
for_anyone.description: An animation composition animating the Beatsaudio™ logo

for_developers.name: Slider Radio
for_developers.description: A tool for developers. Helps create animated slider radio buttons.

for_developers.name: Interactive Card
for_developers.description: A tool for developers. Helps create interactive user interface cards.
